404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.

1.title: Context Engineering Infrastructure
1.description: Comprehensive context management beyond prompt engineering - the right information, at the right time, in the right format.

2.title: 14+ Service Integrations
2.description: Production-ready integrations with GitHub, Slack, Airtable, HubSpot, Notion, Figma, Spotify, Stripe, and more.

3.title: Enhanced MCP Support
3.description: Production-grade Model Context Protocol implementation with built-in OAuth flows and persistent credential management.

4.title: Enterprise Security
4.description: HashiCorp Vault integration, automatic token rotation, encrypted credential storage, and OAuth UI flows.

5.title: RESTful API
5.description: Clean HTTP endpoints with comprehensive documentation at api.context.space that actually work reliably in production.

6.title: Open Source Community
6.description: AGPL v3 license transitioning to Apache 2.0, with active Discord community and welcoming contribution process.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to streamline your workflow and boost productivity with enterprise-grade security and performance

cta.text: Want to see more? Check out our roadmap or

roadmap.title: Context Engineering Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our journey from production-ready integrations to full context engineering infrastructure built on MCP principles.

items.oauthFlows: Built-in OAuth flows and credential management
items.enterpriseSecurity: HashiCorp Vault integration and enterprise security
items.contextMemory: Persistent context memory and state management

login.title: Log In
login.codeSent: Verification code sent! Please check your email.
login.codeFailed: Failed to send verification code. Please try again.
login.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
login.enterBothFields: Please enter both email and verification code
login.captchaFailed: CAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again.
login.checkEmail: Please check your email {email} and click the magic link to sign in.

oauth.tryAgain: Please try again or contact support
oauth.noAutoRedirect: If you are not redirected automatically,

magicLink.verificationFailed: Magic link verification failed. The link may be invalid or expired.
magicLink.expiredDetails: This magic link has expired and is no longer valid. Magic links typically expire after 1 hour for security reasons.
magicLink.expiredHint: Request a new magic link from the login page to continue.
magicLink.disabledDetails: Magic link authentication is currently disabled for this application. Please use an alternative login method.
magicLink.invalidRequestDetails: The magic link request is malformed or contains invalid parameters. Please try requesting a new magic link.
magicLink.rateLimitedDetails: You have requested too many magic links in a short period. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
magicLink.signupDisabledDetails: New account registration is currently disabled. Please contact support if you need access.
magicLink.emailNotConfirmedDetails: Your email address needs to be confirmed before you can sign in. Please check your email for a confirmation link.
magicLink.userNotFoundDetails: No user account was found for this magic link. The account may have been deleted or the link is invalid.
magicLink.badCallbackDetails: The authentication callback from the email link is invalid or corrupted. Please try requesting a new magic link.
magicLink.genericDetails: Please try requesting a new magic link or contact support if the problem persists.
magicLink.timeoutDetails: The authentication process took too long and has timed out. Please try again with a fresh magic link.

mcp.errorOccurred: An error occurred during the OAuth process.
mcp.redirectWait: Please wait while we redirect you to complete the authentication.
mcp.successMessage: Connection successful! This window will close automatically.
mcp.invalidCallback: Invalid OAuth callback - missing required parameters

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Stay up to date with the latest features and releases.

account.title: Account
account.apiKeysDescription: Manage your API keys for accessing all Context Space integrations.
account.apiKeySecurityWarning: Keep your API keys secure! These keys provide access to all your connected integrations and should be treated like passwords.
account.apiKeyNamePlaceholder: Enter a name for your API key
account.createApiKeyDialogDescription: Create a new API key to access all Context Space integrations
account.apiKeyDescriptionHelp: Optional description to help you identify this API key
account.deleteApiKeyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
account.createFirstApiKey: Create your first API key to get started
account.apiKeyLimit: You can create up to {limit} API keys
account.apiKeyLimitDescription: To create more API keys, please delete existing ones first
account.apiKeyLimitError: API key limit reached. You can create up to {limit} keys maximum
account.apiKeyLimitWarning: Approaching API key limit. {remaining} more keys can be created
account.newApiKeyCopyWarning: Please copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!
account.mcpConfigurationDescription: Copy this configuration to your MCP settings (e.g., ~/.cursor/mcp.json) to connect with Context Space.
account.mcpNoApiKeysDescription: You need to create an API key first to generate MCP configuration.
account.addToCursorFailed: Failed to add server to Cursor
account.selectApiKeyPlaceholder: Choose an API key for MCP configuration
account.mcpStep2: Replace <YOUR_API_KEY> with your actual API key: {keyName}
account.mcpStep3: Add it to your MCP settings file (e.g., ~/.cursor/mcp.json)
account.mcpDescriptionForIntegration: Use this configuration to access {integrationName} through MCP in Cursor/Claude or any MCP-compatible application.
account.unifiedMcpDescription: Use the unified Context Space MCP Server to access all integrations with a single configuration.
account.unifiedMcpSubtitle: Access all your connected integrations through a single MCP server configuration.
account.deleteAccountWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.
account.deleteConfirmError: Please type DELETE to confirm account deletion
account.deleteError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
